website_summaries.verdict: For most users, the results are smoother skin and fewer blackheads and blemishes for lower cost than other brands, but it might require frequent use for those with numerous or stubborn blackheads.
pros: A budget-priced mask with similar ingredients to costlier options
Contains skin-nourishing ingredients like tea tree and chamomile extracts, and has a pleasant scent
cons: Might require several applications for major blackhead issues

customer_reviews.title: Must have for acne and oily skin
customer_reviews.text: The tube was smaller than I expected, but the product is great. I have very oily skin and adult acne. I use this mask about 3x a week and have noticed a huge difference. I still get pimples, but when I put the mask on and take it off the pimples are already healing. It really sucks the oil out of your skin, which makes my skin normal, but someone with dry skin might need to moisturize or use sparingly. Also, it waxes most of my face! It hurts a little to take it off because it is gripping the skin so close, but it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: normal skin type
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about trying this because of the viral and painful Facebook videos so many users have shared. This mask oozes out in a thin consistency, a tad bit thinner than toothpaste. To cover my face adequately I used about a quarter of the bottle. After letting the mask set for 25 minutes, I was left with a mask similar to elmer's glue that I peeled off in an upward motion. The charcoal removed surface dirt and brought other impurities to the top layer's of my skin. My face didn't feel dried out after using the black mask, but I rubbed in moisturizer as per my usual skin-care regime.

product_meta.title: Blackhead Remover Mask, Peel off Mask with Bamboo Charcoal, Black Mask for Nose and Face Deep Pores Cleansing and Oil Control, Painless & Easy to Remove, 60 ml/2 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
Discover Potent Ingredients

Papain
It is a great natural exfoliator for the skin. Papain helps remove dullness, discoloration and dead cells to leave skin flawless and supple.

Tea Tree Extract
The extract can balance oil levels, regulate skin pH, refine pores and activate skin cells’ regenerating ability. 

Sodium Hyaluronate
The ingredient highly increases the moisturizing effect of this kind of peel-off mask. 

Barbados Aloe Juice
It is highly efficient at hydrating skin, which can also help with dark spots removing and wound healing. 

Bamboo Charcoal
Created from bamboo ash and valued for its excellent absorption abilities, it acts like a magnet to draw out dirt, debris and impurities.

Chamomile Extract
The plant's many benefits come from its daisy-like flowers, which contain azulene and bisabolol oils. These ingredients contribute to the extract’s ability to soothe and calm ailments such as upset stomachs, unsettled nerves and fragile skin. 

Directions
1. Wash your face with warm water and put a hot towel on your face for a few minutes to open pores. 
2. Apply a thick, even layer on oily parts of your face such as the nose, forehead, chin, and cheeks. Avoid the eye area, eyebrows, hairline and lips. 
3. Leave on for 20-30 minutes until completely dry. Gently peel off the mask from down to top. 
4. Rinse off any residue with cold water. Afterward, use a toner or other pore-shrinking products. Use once or twice a week. 

Cautions
Avoid areas of eyes, eyebrows and lips when you are using the mask. This kind of black mask is not suitable for sensitive skin and it is recommended that customers use the item on hands before using on the face. Not recommend for people who have skin redness, eczema, acne inflammation, sores or suffer from skin allergies. If there is any discomfort, stop using immediately.
feature_bullets: PROVEN BLACKHEAD REMOVER: Known as the “black diamond”, charcoal acts like a magnet to draw out dirt, debris and impurities, to leave your skin clean and smooth
DEEP PORE CLEANSER: Tea tree extract is added to the black mask to increase the absorption of oil and removal of dead skin cells, toxins and dirt; the black mask reveals soft and clear looking skin

INNOVATIVE FORMULA: Papain removes dullness, discoloration and dead cells; chamomile extract soothes and calms the skin; tea tree extract minimizes pores and controls oil; aloe juice boasts anti-inflammation effect; these powerful ingredients act together to promote skin metabolism and leave skin radiant and supple
EASY TO USE: Clean your face and open your pores with a hot towel; apply a thick, even layer on oily parts and wait till it’s completely dry; peel off the mask from down to top
NOTE: Do not use on skin that is prone to allergy or has redness, acne inflammation, or sores
